name: Oleksandr
descr: There is no patch for human stupidity

name: Serhii
descr: Anyone who buys or sells a stock, bond, or commodity for profit is a speculator if he uses intellectual foresight. If he does not do this, he is gambling.

name: Matvii
descr: I am going against the current, but the direction of the current will change.

name: Pavel
descr: Investments in knowledge always give the highest profit.

name: Anton
descr: The Times 03/Jan/2009 Chancellor on brink of second bailout for banks

name: Oleg
descr: I play fair and play to win. If I lose, I take medicines.

name: Dmytro
descr: What matters is the scale of the action. their absolute value. The sign doesn't matter. A minus can easily change to a plus, and vice versa. But zero never changes.
